11.ara-name: كتاب النكاح عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Amr bin Shu'aib narrated from his father, from his grandfather that:The Prophet said: "Whichever man married a woman and entered into her, then it is not lawful for him to marry her daughter. If he did not enter into her then he may marry her daughter. And whichever man married a woman and he entered into her, or he did not enter into her, then it is not lawful for him to marry her mother

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِيمَنْ يَتَزَوَّجُ الْمَرْأَةَ ثُمَّ يُطَلِّقُهَا قَبْلَ أَنْ يَدْخُلَ بِهَا هَلْ يَتَزَوَّجُ ابْنَتَهَا أَمْ لاَ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About A Person Who Marries A Woman, Then Divorces Her Before Having Intercourse With Her: Can He Marry Her Daughter Or Not?
